topics.body:
oh and EVA is simple.

Shinji learns that individuality is worth keeping, but isolation is bad (instrumentality). Human interaction can cause pain but that's what makes it important (hence why all the kids are antisocial in some way). A life fleeing from pain is not living, it's childish (all the adults try to escape their responsibilities).
And don't be beta (him strangling Asuka is him being honest and open so now she respects him as he no longer idolizes her. the only other guy to not idolize her was kaji whom she was obsessed with).


Oh and Anno is definitely purposely fucking with people

Him
!http://i.imgur.com/folqbNj.jpg!
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f
